					<h1><a href="/academics/gradschool/" title="Graduate School" accesskey="2"><span class="site-title">Graduate School</span></a></h1><div id="site-slogan" class="slogan banner-subtext"></div>				</div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
										
					<a href="#sidebar-left" id="skip-to-nav">Skip to Navigation</a>

									
						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Music: Computer Music and Multimedia</h1>
					<div class="columns main-columns">


						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							<div class="clear-block">
								

<article id="node-1183" class="main-article node">







  <div class="content">
        
    <p><span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-left" style="width:203px;"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/gradschool/sites/brown.edu.academics.gradschool/files/images/computermusic_multi.preview.jpg" alt="" title=""  class="image image-preview " width="195" height="146" /></span>The Ph.D. program in&nbsp;<a href="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/computer-music-multimedia-meme" target="_blank">Computer Music and Multimedia</a>&nbsp;focuses on the analysis and production of original multidisciplinary works of art, exploring the use of digital music and sound in combination with video, performance, and text.</p>
<p>The program consists of advanced examinations of theoretical, technical, cultural, and aesthetic issues surrounding music and multimedia production, centering on the use of interactive technologies and gestural control in performance. Research and production are supported by the department's Multimedia and Electronic Music Experiments (MEME) studios, with extensive resources in interactive software and hardware.</p>
<p>Additional resources:&nbsp;Multimedia and Electronic Music Experiments (MEME) studios, video and audio recording equipment, multimedia lab.</p>
<p><strong>Completion Requirements<br />A.M.: </strong>Eight courses selected in consultation with advisor; expertise in one programming language; qualifying review; thesis in the form of an audio CD, an electronic performance, a work for DVD, an internet production, or an art/sound installation. Students entering the program without the A.M. earn that degree as part of their progress toward the Ph.D. We do not encourage applicants who seek the A.M. as a terminal degree.</p>
<p><strong>Ph.D.: </strong>In addition to the courses required for the A.M., five additional courses for a total of 13. Required courses include a minimum of four graduate-level seminars offered by the electronic music and multimedia program. After completion of all coursework in the third year, the candidate will take a three-hour oral preliminary examination. Passing the preliminary examination authorizes the candidate to proceed to the doctoral dissertation, which is completed during the fourth and fifth years.</p>
<p><strong>Admission Information<br />Admission requirements:</strong>&nbsp;Submit  on online portfolio of three to four examples of your best creative  work; examples can include music, videos, installations, performances,  scores or any other creative work. Please include brief notes about each  work and anything else that may help guide in the evaluation process. A  writing sample is not required, but is optional. Candidates are  evaluated primarily on their creative work.</p>
<p><strong>GRE General:&nbsp;</strong>Required<br /><strong>GRE Subject:&nbsp;</strong>Not required<br /><strong>Application deadline:</strong>&nbsp;January 7</p>
<div class="image-clear"></div>  </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

			
	    
		</div><!-- end .meta -->
	</div>

</article>

	<div id="top-destinations" class="clear-block block block-menu ">
	
	<h2>Top Destinations</h2>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">404: Not Found</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column no-left-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
<article id="node-172" class="main-article node">








  <div class="content">
        <p>The page that you requested could not be found.</p>
<p>Consider trying the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.brown.edu/search/google/">search</a>, the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.brown.edu/a-to-z">A-Z directory</a>, or one of the Audience Gateways located at the top of the page.</p>
  </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

			
	    
		</div><!-- end .meta -->
	</div>

</article>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">404: Not Found</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column no-left-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
<article id="node-172" class="main-article node">








  <div class="content">
        <p>The page that you requested could not be found.</p>
<p>Consider trying the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.brown.edu/search/google/">search</a>, the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.brown.edu/a-to-z">A-Z directory</a>, or one of the Audience Gateways located at the top of the page.</p>
  </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

			
	    
		</div><!-- end .meta -->
	</div>

</article>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">News</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
                            <h2 class="alt">News and Announcements</h2>
								<div class="view view-news view-id-news view-display-id-page_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
          

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser left-image first-row">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong">Announcing the Winner of the Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition: Brian Vuong</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-left teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/Brian_Vuong-250x250.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p class="p1">Congratulations to pianist Brian Vuong on winning the 2017-18 Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition! Brian performed the Liszt Concerto No. 1 in E-flat Major. As the competition-winner, Brian will perform a concerto with the Orchestra during the Spring 2018 semester. The other finalists were Scott Guo and Derek Xu. Many thanks to all Competition participants for their hard work.</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 13, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/october-20-21-orchestra-concert-program-change">October 20-21 Orchestra Concert Program Change</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Please note: there has been a change to the program for the Brown University Orchestra concert taking place on October 20-21, 2017 at Sayles Hall. The Orchestra plays Brahms' Symphony No. 1. <a href="https://payment.brown.edu/C20460_ustores/web/product_detail.jsp?PRODUCTID=2239&amp;SINGLESTORE=true">Tickets are available for advance purchase here</a>.</p>
<p>Tracy Silverman's "Love Song to the Sun" has postponed to a later date to be announced. Stay tuned!</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 12, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser right-image">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw">Jeff Titon, Brown University Professor of Music, Emeritus, Honored with Outstanding Achievement Award from University of Minnesota</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-right teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/jtiton.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Jeff Todd Titon, Professor of Music (Ethnomusicology), Emeritus, will receive an Outstanding Achievement Award on October 17, 2017 from the University of Minnesota, his graduate school alma mater.</p>
<p>According to UM’s website:</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 5, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/seeking-musicians-perform-family-weekend-brunch-recital">Seeking Musicians to Perform at Family Weekend Brunch Recital</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>The Department of Music seeks musicians to perform at the Family Weekend Brunch Recital.<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Family Weekend Brunch Recital</strong><br />Grant Recital Hall<br />October 14, 2017<br />Brunch @ 10:15am&nbsp; /&nbsp; Recital @ 11:00am<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Please note: students who wish to perform are required to have a faculty sponsor</strong>. Solo players and ensembles alike are invited to participate. All forms of music are welcome. Compositions should be no longer than 5 minutes in length.</p>
<p>Sign-up Deadline: <strong>Friday, October 6</strong></p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 20, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/consider-registering-these-courses">Consider Registering for These Courses</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Consider registering for these Fall 2017 music courses you might have missed so far during your shopping period.<strong> </strong></p>
<p><strong>Orchestral Conducting</strong> (MUSC 1701)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Music, Civil Society, and Public Service</strong> (MUSC 1400)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Experimental Voice</strong> (MUSC 2245)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Sound, Song and Salvation in South Asia</strong> (COST 0030)</p>
<h6></h6>
<p>Register today at <a href="https://cab.brown.edu/" title="https://cab.brown.edu/">https://cab.brown.edu/</a></p>
<p>For more information about these courses, see below.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 8, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    </div>
  
      <div class="item-list"><ul class="pager"><li class="pager-previous first">&nbsp;</li>
<li class="pager-current">1 of 15</li>
<li class="pager-next last"><a href="/academics/music/news?page=1" class="active">››</a></li>
</ul></div>  
  
  
  
  
</div> 							</div>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">News</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
                            <h2 class="alt">News and Announcements</h2>
								<div class="view view-news view-id-news view-display-id-page_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
          

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser left-image first-row">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong">Announcing the Winner of the Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition: Brian Vuong</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-left teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/Brian_Vuong-250x250.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p class="p1">Congratulations to pianist Brian Vuong on winning the 2017-18 Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition! Brian performed the Liszt Concerto No. 1 in E-flat Major. As the competition-winner, Brian will perform a concerto with the Orchestra during the Spring 2018 semester. The other finalists were Scott Guo and Derek Xu. Many thanks to all Competition participants for their hard work.</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 13, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/october-20-21-orchestra-concert-program-change">October 20-21 Orchestra Concert Program Change</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Please note: there has been a change to the program for the Brown University Orchestra concert taking place on October 20-21, 2017 at Sayles Hall. The Orchestra plays Brahms' Symphony No. 1. <a href="https://payment.brown.edu/C20460_ustores/web/product_detail.jsp?PRODUCTID=2239&amp;SINGLESTORE=true">Tickets are available for advance purchase here</a>.</p>
<p>Tracy Silverman's "Love Song to the Sun" has postponed to a later date to be announced. Stay tuned!</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 12, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser right-image">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw">Jeff Titon, Brown University Professor of Music, Emeritus, Honored with Outstanding Achievement Award from University of Minnesota</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-right teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/jtiton.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Jeff Todd Titon, Professor of Music (Ethnomusicology), Emeritus, will receive an Outstanding Achievement Award on October 17, 2017 from the University of Minnesota, his graduate school alma mater.</p>
<p>According to UM’s website:</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 5, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/seeking-musicians-perform-family-weekend-brunch-recital">Seeking Musicians to Perform at Family Weekend Brunch Recital</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>The Department of Music seeks musicians to perform at the Family Weekend Brunch Recital.<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Family Weekend Brunch Recital</strong><br />Grant Recital Hall<br />October 14, 2017<br />Brunch @ 10:15am&nbsp; /&nbsp; Recital @ 11:00am<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Please note: students who wish to perform are required to have a faculty sponsor</strong>. Solo players and ensembles alike are invited to participate. All forms of music are welcome. Compositions should be no longer than 5 minutes in length.</p>
<p>Sign-up Deadline: <strong>Friday, October 6</strong></p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 20, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/consider-registering-these-courses">Consider Registering for These Courses</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Consider registering for these Fall 2017 music courses you might have missed so far during your shopping period.<strong> </strong></p>
<p><strong>Orchestral Conducting</strong> (MUSC 1701)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Music, Civil Society, and Public Service</strong> (MUSC 1400)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Experimental Voice</strong> (MUSC 2245)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Sound, Song and Salvation in South Asia</strong> (COST 0030)</p>
<h6></h6>
<p>Register today at <a href="https://cab.brown.edu/" title="https://cab.brown.edu/">https://cab.brown.edu/</a></p>
<p>For more information about these courses, see below.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 8, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    </div>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">News</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
                            <h2 class="alt">News and Announcements</h2>
								<div class="view view-news view-id-news view-display-id-page_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
          

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser left-image first-row">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong">Announcing the Winner of the Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition: Brian Vuong</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-left teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/Brian_Vuong-250x250.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p class="p1">Congratulations to pianist Brian Vuong on winning the 2017-18 Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition! Brian performed the Liszt Concerto No. 1 in E-flat Major. As the competition-winner, Brian will perform a concerto with the Orchestra during the Spring 2018 semester. The other finalists were Scott Guo and Derek Xu. Many thanks to all Competition participants for their hard work.</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 13, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/october-20-21-orchestra-concert-program-change">October 20-21 Orchestra Concert Program Change</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Please note: there has been a change to the program for the Brown University Orchestra concert taking place on October 20-21, 2017 at Sayles Hall. The Orchestra plays Brahms' Symphony No. 1. <a href="https://payment.brown.edu/C20460_ustores/web/product_detail.jsp?PRODUCTID=2239&amp;SINGLESTORE=true">Tickets are available for advance purchase here</a>.</p>
<p>Tracy Silverman's "Love Song to the Sun" has postponed to a later date to be announced. Stay tuned!</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 12, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser right-image">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw">Jeff Titon, Brown University Professor of Music, Emeritus, Honored with Outstanding Achievement Award from University of Minnesota</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-right teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/jtiton.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Jeff Todd Titon, Professor of Music (Ethnomusicology), Emeritus, will receive an Outstanding Achievement Award on October 17, 2017 from the University of Minnesota, his graduate school alma mater.</p>
<p>According to UM’s website:</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 5, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/seeking-musicians-perform-family-weekend-brunch-recital">Seeking Musicians to Perform at Family Weekend Brunch Recital</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>The Department of Music seeks musicians to perform at the Family Weekend Brunch Recital.<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Family Weekend Brunch Recital</strong><br />Grant Recital Hall<br />October 14, 2017<br />Brunch @ 10:15am&nbsp; /&nbsp; Recital @ 11:00am<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Please note: students who wish to perform are required to have a faculty sponsor</strong>. Solo players and ensembles alike are invited to participate. All forms of music are welcome. Compositions should be no longer than 5 minutes in length.</p>
<p>Sign-up Deadline: <strong>Friday, October 6</strong></p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 20, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/consider-registering-these-courses">Consider Registering for These Courses</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Consider registering for these Fall 2017 music courses you might have missed so far during your shopping period.<strong> </strong></p>
<p><strong>Orchestral Conducting</strong> (MUSC 1701)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Music, Civil Society, and Public Service</strong> (MUSC 1400)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Experimental Voice</strong> (MUSC 2245)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Sound, Song and Salvation in South Asia</strong> (COST 0030)</p>
<h6></h6>
<p>Register today at <a href="https://cab.brown.edu/" title="https://cab.brown.edu/">https://cab.brown.edu/</a></p>
<p>For more information about these courses, see below.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 8, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    </div>

		<div id="home-wrapper" class="wrapper">
		
			<header id="header-region">
				<section id="audience-gateways">
					<div class="marginator">
						<h6>Information For:</h6> 
						<ul> 
							<li id="gateway-current-students" class="first"><a href="/gateway/current-students">Current Students</a></li> 
							<li id="gateway-faculty"><a href="/gateway/faculty">Faculty</a></li>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">News</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
                            <h2 class="alt">News and Announcements</h2>
								<div class="view view-news view-id-news view-display-id-page_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
          

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser left-image first-row">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong">Announcing the Winner of the Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition: Brian Vuong</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-left teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/Brian_Vuong-250x250.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p class="p1">Congratulations to pianist Brian Vuong on winning the 2017-18 Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition! Brian performed the Liszt Concerto No. 1 in E-flat Major. As the competition-winner, Brian will perform a concerto with the Orchestra during the Spring 2018 semester. The other finalists were Scott Guo and Derek Xu. Many thanks to all Competition participants for their hard work.</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 13, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/october-20-21-orchestra-concert-program-change">October 20-21 Orchestra Concert Program Change</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Please note: there has been a change to the program for the Brown University Orchestra concert taking place on October 20-21, 2017 at Sayles Hall. The Orchestra plays Brahms' Symphony No. 1. <a href="https://payment.brown.edu/C20460_ustores/web/product_detail.jsp?PRODUCTID=2239&amp;SINGLESTORE=true">Tickets are available for advance purchase here</a>.</p>
<p>Tracy Silverman's "Love Song to the Sun" has postponed to a later date to be announced. Stay tuned!</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 12, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser right-image">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw">Jeff Titon, Brown University Professor of Music, Emeritus, Honored with Outstanding Achievement Award from University of Minnesota</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-right teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/jtiton.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Jeff Todd Titon, Professor of Music (Ethnomusicology), Emeritus, will receive an Outstanding Achievement Award on October 17, 2017 from the University of Minnesota, his graduate school alma mater.</p>
<p>According to UM’s website:</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 5, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/seeking-musicians-perform-family-weekend-brunch-recital">Seeking Musicians to Perform at Family Weekend Brunch Recital</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>The Department of Music seeks musicians to perform at the Family Weekend Brunch Recital.<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Family Weekend Brunch Recital</strong><br />Grant Recital Hall<br />October 14, 2017<br />Brunch @ 10:15am&nbsp; /&nbsp; Recital @ 11:00am<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Please note: students who wish to perform are required to have a faculty sponsor</strong>. Solo players and ensembles alike are invited to participate. All forms of music are welcome. Compositions should be no longer than 5 minutes in length.</p>
<p>Sign-up Deadline: <strong>Friday, October 6</strong></p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 20, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/consider-registering-these-courses">Consider Registering for These Courses</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Consider registering for these Fall 2017 music courses you might have missed so far during your shopping period.<strong> </strong></p>
<p><strong>Orchestral Conducting</strong> (MUSC 1701)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Music, Civil Society, and Public Service</strong> (MUSC 1400)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Experimental Voice</strong> (MUSC 2245)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Sound, Song and Salvation in South Asia</strong> (COST 0030)</p>
<h6></h6>
<p>Register today at <a href="https://cab.brown.edu/" title="https://cab.brown.edu/">https://cab.brown.edu/</a></p>
<p>For more information about these courses, see below.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 8, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    </div>

</ul></div>

                <span class="field-content"><a href="/academics/music/events/gregorio-uribe-brown-jazz-band">Gregorio Uribe with the Brown Jazz Band</a></span>
  </div>
</li>
      </ul>
</div><div class="item-list date">
    	    <h5><span class="month day-of-the-week">Nov</span>
        <span class="day">17</span>
    </h5>
    <ul>
          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">

                <span class="field-content"><a href="/academics/music/events/piano-workshop-38">Piano Workshop</a></span>
  </div>
</li>
      </ul>

    </h5>
    <ul>
          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">

  </div>

      </ul>
</div><div class="item-list date">

    </h5>
    <ul>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">News</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
                            <h2 class="alt">News and Announcements</h2>
								<div class="view view-news view-id-news view-display-id-page_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
          

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser left-image first-row">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong">Announcing the Winner of the Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition: Brian Vuong</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-left teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/Brian_Vuong-250x250.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p class="p1">Congratulations to pianist Brian Vuong on winning the 2017-18 Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition! Brian performed the Liszt Concerto No. 1 in E-flat Major. As the competition-winner, Brian will perform a concerto with the Orchestra during the Spring 2018 semester. The other finalists were Scott Guo and Derek Xu. Many thanks to all Competition participants for their hard work.</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 13, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/october-20-21-orchestra-concert-program-change">October 20-21 Orchestra Concert Program Change</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Please note: there has been a change to the program for the Brown University Orchestra concert taking place on October 20-21, 2017 at Sayles Hall. The Orchestra plays Brahms' Symphony No. 1. <a href="https://payment.brown.edu/C20460_ustores/web/product_detail.jsp?PRODUCTID=2239&amp;SINGLESTORE=true">Tickets are available for advance purchase here</a>.</p>
<p>Tracy Silverman's "Love Song to the Sun" has postponed to a later date to be announced. Stay tuned!</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 12, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser right-image">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw">Jeff Titon, Brown University Professor of Music, Emeritus, Honored with Outstanding Achievement Award from University of Minnesota</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-right teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/jtiton.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Jeff Todd Titon, Professor of Music (Ethnomusicology), Emeritus, will receive an Outstanding Achievement Award on October 17, 2017 from the University of Minnesota, his graduate school alma mater.</p>
<p>According to UM’s website:</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 5, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/seeking-musicians-perform-family-weekend-brunch-recital">Seeking Musicians to Perform at Family Weekend Brunch Recital</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>The Department of Music seeks musicians to perform at the Family Weekend Brunch Recital.<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Family Weekend Brunch Recital</strong><br />Grant Recital Hall<br />October 14, 2017<br />Brunch @ 10:15am&nbsp; /&nbsp; Recital @ 11:00am<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Please note: students who wish to perform are required to have a faculty sponsor</strong>. Solo players and ensembles alike are invited to participate. All forms of music are welcome. Compositions should be no longer than 5 minutes in length.</p>
<p>Sign-up Deadline: <strong>Friday, October 6</strong></p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 20, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/consider-registering-these-courses">Consider Registering for These Courses</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Consider registering for these Fall 2017 music courses you might have missed so far during your shopping period.<strong> </strong></p>
<p><strong>Orchestral Conducting</strong> (MUSC 1701)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Music, Civil Society, and Public Service</strong> (MUSC 1400)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Experimental Voice</strong> (MUSC 2245)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Sound, Song and Salvation in South Asia</strong> (COST 0030)</p>
<h6></h6>
<p>Register today at <a href="https://cab.brown.edu/" title="https://cab.brown.edu/">https://cab.brown.edu/</a></p>
<p>For more information about these courses, see below.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 8, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    </div>

		<section id="content-bottom">
			
<div id="spotlight" class="clear-block block block-views the-bar">

  <h2>Spotlight</h2>
  <div class="content"><div class="view view-thebar view-id-thebar view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-4">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <ul class="jcarousel jcarousel-view--thebar--block-1 jcarousel-dom-1 jcarousel-skin-default">
      <li class="jcarousel-item-1 odd">  
  <div class="views-field-field-bar-image-fid">
                <span class="field-content"><a href="http://www.browndailyherald.com/2017/10/03/lumen-gallery-provide-new-meditative-space-granoff/"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/bar_item_image/bar-items/images/granoff-650x397.jpg" alt="" title="" width="160" height="90" class="imagecache imagecache-bar_item_image imagecache-default imagecache-bar_item_image_default"/></a></span>
  </div>
  
  <div class="views-field-tid">
                <span class="field-content">In The News</span>
  </div>
  
  <div class="views-field-title">
                <span class="field-content"><a href="http://www.browndailyherald.com/2017/10/03/lumen-gallery-provide-new-meditative-space-granoff/">‘Lumen’ gallery to provide new meditative space in Granoff</a></span>
  </div>
</li>
  </ul>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>

  
    <style type="text/css">
      .view-thebar .jcarousel-skin-default .jcarousel-clip-horizontal, .view-thebar .jcarousel-skin-default .jcarousel-container-horizontal {
        width: 180px; /* each item is 157px + 23px of padding/margin */
      }
      .view-thebar .jcarousel-skin-default .jcarousel-clip-vertical, .view-thebar .jcarousel-skin-default .jcarousel-container-vertical {
        height: 225px;
      }
      .view-thebar .jcarousel-skin-default .jcarousel-clip-vertical {
        height: 205px;
      }
  </style>

    <style type="text/css">
      .view-thebar {
        margin-top: -20px;
      }
    </style>
  <![endif]-->
</div>
	</section>

	<div id="block-brown_slides-273" class="clear-block block block-brown_slides ">
	
		
		<div class="content">


	<div id="node-273" class="brown-slide-collection">
	
				<div class="collection-wrapper">
			
									<ul class="slideshow brown-slideshow" id="slideshow-273" style="height:287px">
								<li class="slide brown-slide first">


	<div id="node-275" class="brown-slide slide slide-image">
	
				<div class="slide-wrapper">

					<h3>Jazz Band</h3>
					<div class="slide-text">
						<p>The Department of Music at Brown offers a huge array of performing  opportunities, all offered for academic credit. Students may choose to  join one of the department's 40 performing groups.</p>
					</div>				
				</div>

	</div><!-- end .brown-slide -->

				</div>

						
						<div class="thumbnail" style="display: none;"><a href="/academics/music/brown-slides/slides/preview/323"><img src="/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/images/Slide2.brown_slides_navigation.png" alt="" /></a></div>
	
		</div>
	
			
	</div><!-- end .brown-slide -->


</li>
								<li class="slide brown-slide last">


	<div id="node-324" class="brown-slide slide slide-image">
	
				<div class="slide-wrapper">
											
				<img src="/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/images/orch.brown_slides_full.jpg" alt="Orchestra" class="slide-main-image" />
				<div class="caption caption-left">
					<h3>Orchestra</h3>
					<div class="slide-text">
						<p>The Department of Music at Brown offers a huge array of performing   opportunities, all offered for academic credit. Students may choose to   join one of the department's 40 performing groups.</p>
					</div>				
				</div>

						
						<div class="thumbnail" style="display: none;"><a href="/academics/music/brown-slides/slides/preview/324"><img src="/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/images/orch.brown_slides_navigation.jpg" alt="" /></a></div>
	
		</div>
	
			
	</div><!-- end .brown-slide -->


</li>
							</ul>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">News</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
                            <h2 class="alt">News and Announcements</h2>
								<div class="view view-news view-id-news view-display-id-page_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
          

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser left-image first-row">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong">Announcing the Winner of the Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition: Brian Vuong</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-left teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/announcing-winner-brown-orchestra-concerto-competition-brian-vuong" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/Brian_Vuong-250x250.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p class="p1">Congratulations to pianist Brian Vuong on winning the 2017-18 Brown Orchestra Concerto Competition! Brian performed the Liszt Concerto No. 1 in E-flat Major. As the competition-winner, Brian will perform a concerto with the Orchestra during the Spring 2018 semester. The other finalists were Scott Guo and Derek Xu. Many thanks to all Competition participants for their hard work.</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 13, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/october-20-21-orchestra-concert-program-change">October 20-21 Orchestra Concert Program Change</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Please note: there has been a change to the program for the Brown University Orchestra concert taking place on October 20-21, 2017 at Sayles Hall. The Orchestra plays Brahms' Symphony No. 1. <a href="https://payment.brown.edu/C20460_ustores/web/product_detail.jsp?PRODUCTID=2239&amp;SINGLESTORE=true">Tickets are available for advance purchase here</a>.</p>
<p>Tracy Silverman's "Love Song to the Sun" has postponed to a later date to be announced. Stay tuned!</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 12, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser right-image">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw">Jeff Titon, Brown University Professor of Music, Emeritus, Honored with Outstanding Achievement Award from University of Minnesota</a></h3>

<span class="thumbnail-wrapper inline inline-right teaser-thumbnail"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-10/jeff-titon-brown-university-professor-music-emeritus-honored-outstanding-achievement-aw" class="teaser-image"><img src="https://www.brown.edu/academics/music/sites/brown.edu.academics.music/files/imagecache/ursa_teaser_image/images/news/2016/jtiton.jpg" alt=" " title=" " width="140" height="170" class="imagecache imagecache-ursa_teaser_image"/></a></span>


	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Jeff Todd Titon, Professor of Music (Ethnomusicology), Emeritus, will receive an Outstanding Achievement Award on October 17, 2017 from the University of Minnesota, his graduate school alma mater.</p>
<p>According to UM’s website:</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed October 5, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/seeking-musicians-perform-family-weekend-brunch-recital">Seeking Musicians to Perform at Family Weekend Brunch Recital</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>The Department of Music seeks musicians to perform at the Family Weekend Brunch Recital.<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Family Weekend Brunch Recital</strong><br />Grant Recital Hall<br />October 14, 2017<br />Brunch @ 10:15am&nbsp; /&nbsp; Recital @ 11:00am<strong></strong></p>
<p><strong>Please note: students who wish to perform are required to have a faculty sponsor</strong>. Solo players and ensembles alike are invited to participate. All forms of music are welcome. Compositions should be no longer than 5 minutes in length.</p>
<p>Sign-up Deadline: <strong>Friday, October 6</strong></p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 20, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    

<article class="content news_story clear-block teaser ">




	<h3 class="teaser-title"><a href="/academics/music/news/2017-09/consider-registering-these-courses">Consider Registering for These Courses</a></h3>




	<div class="teaser-content">
		<p>Consider registering for these Fall 2017 music courses you might have missed so far during your shopping period.<strong> </strong></p>
<p><strong>Orchestral Conducting</strong> (MUSC 1701)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Music, Civil Society, and Public Service</strong> (MUSC 1400)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Experimental Voice</strong> (MUSC 2245)<strong>&nbsp;</strong><strong><br />Sound, Song and Salvation in South Asia</strong> (COST 0030)</p>
<h6></h6>
<p>Register today at <a href="https://cab.brown.edu/" title="https://cab.brown.edu/">https://cab.brown.edu/</a></p>
<p>For more information about these courses, see below.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
		<strong class="distributed-date">(Distributed September 8, 2017)</strong>
	</div>


</article>
    </div>

</ul></div>

  <h2>Spotlight</h2>
  <div class="content"><div class="view view-thebar view-id-thebar view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-4">

  </div>

  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Voice</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0810 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13796]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program. A fee is charged for enrollment. Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Louis+F+Jodry">Louis F Jodry</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Keyboard</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0810 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13797]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program. A fee is charged for enrollment. Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Arlene+M+Cole">Arlene M Cole</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Strings</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0810 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13798]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program. A fee is charged for enrollment. Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Paul+S+Phillips">Paul S Phillips</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	<div id="block-views-contact_information-block_1" class="clear-block block block-views ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Wind/Brass/Percussion/Jazz</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0810 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13799]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program. A fee is charged for enrollment. Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Matthew+R+McGarrell">Matthew R McGarrell</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Ethnomusicology</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0810 S05 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13800]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program. A fee is charged for enrollment. Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Marc+A+Perlman">Marc A Perlman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	<div id="block-views-contact_information-block_1" class="clear-block block block-views ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Special</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0810 S06 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13801]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program. A fee is charged for enrollment. Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joseph+W+Rovan">Joseph W Rovan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Voice</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1810 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13802]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Restricted to skilled musicians demonstrating mastery of an advanced repertory in their fields.  Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program.  MUSC 0830, 0840 is prerequisite to this course.  A fee is charged for enrollment.  Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  Prerequisite: MUSC 0400, or MUSC 0550, MUSC 0560.  Written permission required.   May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Louis+F+Jodry">Louis F Jodry</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	<div id="block-views-contact_information-block_1" class="clear-block block block-views ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Keyboard</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1810 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13803]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Restricted to skilled musicians demonstrating mastery of an advanced repertory in their fields.  Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program.  MUSC 0830, 0840 is prerequisite to this course.  A fee is charged for enrollment.  Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  Prerequisite: MUSC 0400, or MUSC 0550, MUSC 0560.  Written permission required.   May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Arlene+M+Cole">Arlene M Cole</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

					<h4>Brown University</h4>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Strings</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1810 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13804]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Restricted to skilled musicians demonstrating mastery of an advanced repertory in their fields.  Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program.  MUSC 0830, 0840 is prerequisite to this course.  A fee is charged for enrollment.  Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  Prerequisite: MUSC 0400, or MUSC 0550, MUSC 0560.  Written permission required.   May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Paul+S+Phillips">Paul S Phillips</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	<div id="block-views-contact_information-block_1" class="clear-block block block-views ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Wind/Brass/Percussion/Jazz</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1810 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13805]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Restricted to skilled musicians demonstrating mastery of an advanced repertory in their fields.  Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program.  MUSC 0830, 0840 is prerequisite to this course.  A fee is charged for enrollment.  Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  Prerequisite: MUSC 0400, or MUSC 0550, MUSC 0560.  Written permission required.   May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Matthew+R+McGarrell">Matthew R McGarrell</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

			<div class="marginator">
				<div id="brown-footer" class="clear-block block block-block ">

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Ethnomusicology</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1810 S05 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13806]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Restricted to skilled musicians demonstrating mastery of an advanced repertory in their fields.  Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program.  MUSC 0830, 0840 is prerequisite to this course.  A fee is charged for enrollment.  Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  Prerequisite: MUSC 0400, or MUSC 0550, MUSC 0560.  Written permission required.   May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Marc+A+Perlman">Marc A Perlman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

	</div>


	
	<div id="block-views-contact_information-block_1" class="clear-block block block-views ">
	
		
		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Applied Music Program: Instruction in Vocal or Instrumental Music - Special</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1810 S06 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13807]</span></h3>


  	Half credit each semester. Restricted to skilled musicians. Restricted to skilled musicians demonstrating mastery of an advanced repertory in their fields.  Openings are limited. Enrollment and re-enrollment is by audition and jury. Lessons are given by consultants to the Applied Music Program.  MUSC 0830, 0840 is prerequisite to this course.  A fee is charged for enrollment.  Copies of the Applied Music Program Guidelines giving detailed information are available online at www.brown.edu/music.  Prerequisite: MUSC 0400, or MUSC 0550, MUSC 0560.  Written permission required.   May be repeated up to four times for credit.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joseph+W+Rovan">Joseph W Rovan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13808]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

      <div class="view-content">

    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13809]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13810]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Arlene+M+Cole">Arlene M Cole</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

    </div>

	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13811]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">
