<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S05 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13812]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Matthew+R+McGarrell">Matthew R McGarrell</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

    </div>

	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S06 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13813]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Martin+K+Obeng">Martin K Obeng</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S07 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13814]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Marc+A+Perlman">Marc A Perlman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S08 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13815]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Paul+S+Phillips">Paul S Phillips</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S09 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13816]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joseph+W+Rovan">Joseph W Rovan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S10 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13817]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Eric+T+Nathan">Eric T Nathan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S11 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13818]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

	<div class="adr">

	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S12 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13819]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S13 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13820]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Todd+E+Winkler">Todd E Winkler</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S14 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13821]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=James+R+Moses">James R Moses</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S15 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13822]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kiri+M+Miller">Kiri M Miller</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S16 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13823]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Christopher+J+Tucker">Christopher J Tucker</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S17 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13824]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Mark+F+Steinbach">Mark F Steinbach</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

		<div class="content"><div class="view view-contact-information view-id-contact_information view-display-id-block_1 view-dom-id-1">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S18 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13825]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Louis+F+Jodry">Louis F Jodry</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S19 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13826]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Ed+Osborn">Ed Osborn</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S20 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13827]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Dana+A+Gooley">Dana A Gooley</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S21 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13828]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Lu+Wang">Lu Wang</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Individual Independent Study</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1970 S22 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13829]</span></h3>


  	Directed undergraduate research for advanced students. Prerequisite: permission of the instructor. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13830]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Eric+T+Nathan">Eric T Nathan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13831]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Lu+Wang">Lu Wang</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S03 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13832]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Arlene+M+Cole">Arlene M Cole</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S04 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13833]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Ed+Osborn">Ed Osborn</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S05 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13834]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Matthew+R+McGarrell">Matthew R McGarrell</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S06 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13835]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Martin+K+Obeng">Martin K Obeng</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S07 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13836]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Marc+A+Perlman">Marc A Perlman</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

      <div class="view-content">

    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S08 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13837]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Paul+S+Phillips">Paul S Phillips</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S09 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13838]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Joseph+W+Rovan">Joseph W Rovan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

      <div class="view-content">

    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S10 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13839]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kristina+M+Warren">Kristina M Warren</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S11 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13840]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>
		</div>
			<div class="post-office-box">Box 1924</div>
<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S12 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13841]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S13 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13842]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Todd+E+Winkler">Todd E Winkler</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">

							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S14 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13843]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=James+R+Moses">James R Moses</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S15 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13844]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Kiri+M+Miller">Kiri M Miller</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

      <div class="view-content">

    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S16 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13845]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Christopher+J+Tucker">Christopher J Tucker</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S18 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13846]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Louis+F+Jodry">Louis F Jodry</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

      <div class="view-content">

    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">

<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S20 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13847]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Dana+A+Gooley">Dana A Gooley</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Reading and Research</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2980 S21 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 13848]</span></h3>


  	Directed graduate research. Section numbers vary by instructor. Please check Banner for the correct section number and CRN to use when registering for this course.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>I: Independent Study/Research</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <div class="vcard">
	<div class="adr">
		<div class="org">
		 <div class="organization-name">Brown University</div>
		</div>
			<div class="post-office-box">Box 1924</div>
<div class="street-address">Orwig Music Building
		<br />1 Young Orchard Avenue</div>
		<span class="locality">Providence</span>, <abbr class="region" title="Rhode Island">RI</abbr> <span class="postal-code">02912</span>
	</div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Phone</span> <span class="value">401-863-3234</span></div>
	<div class="tel"><span class="type">Fax</span> <span class="value">401-863-1256</span></div>
	<div><a class="email" href="mailto:music@brown.edu">music@brown.edu</a></div>
</div>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div> </div>
			
				
	</div>

							</div>
						
					</div><!-- end .columns -->

					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Preliminary Examination Preparation</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2970 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15009]</span></h3>


  	For graduate students who have met the tuition requirement and are paying the registration fee to continue active enrollment while preparing for a preliminary examination.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>E: Grad Enrollment Fee/Dist Prep</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Thesis Preparation</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 2990 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 15010]</span></h3>


  	For graduate students who have met the tuition requirement and are paying the registration fee to continue active enrollment while preparing a thesis.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


		

	
				
		
		
					<dt>Meeting Type</dt>
			<dd>E: Grad Enrollment Fee/Dist Prep</dd>
		
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
						
													<div id="sidebar-left" class="sidebar first-column column">

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">
							
	
	<div id="music-events" class="clear-block block block-views ">
	
	<h2>Music Events</h2>	
		<div class="content"><div class="view view-Events view-id-Events view-display-id-block_2 super-events-list view-dom-id-2">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Theory of Tonal Music</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0550 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 16528]</span></h3>


  	Prerequisite to music concentration. For students with knowledge of rudiments of music, including scales, intervals, key signatures, rhythm, and meter. Knowledge of keyboard strongly recommended. Intensive study of voice leading and tonal harmony; analysis, ear training, sight singing, keyboard exercises. An entrance exam will be administered in Orwig 315 at the first regular class meeting. Students intending to enroll in MUSC 0550 must pass this test. Experienced instrumentalists or singers who have facility sight reading music normally place into MUSC0550. MUSC0400 is appropriate for students who need training in the rudiments to prepare for MUSC0550. MUSC0550 is prerequisite to MUSC0560.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>65</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Eric+T+Nathan">Eric T Nathan</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">10:30 - 11:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>13</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Theory of Tonal Music</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0550 S02 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 16529]</span></h3>


  	Prerequisite to music concentration. For students with knowledge of rudiments of music, including scales, intervals, key signatures, rhythm, and meter. Knowledge of keyboard strongly recommended. Intensive study of voice leading and tonal harmony; analysis, ear training, sight singing, keyboard exercises. An entrance exam will be administered in Orwig 315 at the first regular class meeting. Students intending to enroll in MUSC 0550 must pass this test. Experienced instrumentalists or singers who have facility sight reading music normally place into MUSC0550. MUSC0400 is appropriate for students who need training in the rudiments to prepare for MUSC0550. MUSC0550 is prerequisite to MUSC0560.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>65</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Mark+F+Steinbach">Mark F Steinbach</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">13:00 - 14:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>10</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

											<div id="sidebar-right" class="sidebar third-column column">
							
	
	<div id="music-events" class="clear-block block block-views ">
	
	<h2>Music Events</h2>	
		<div class="content"><div class="view view-Events view-id-Events view-display-id-block_2 super-events-list view-dom-id-2">
    
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
      <div class="item-list date">
    	    <h5><span class="month day-of-the-week">Oct</span>
        <span class="day">17</span>
    </h5>
    <ul>
          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">  
  <div class="views-field-title">
                <span class="field-content"><a href="/academics/music/events/jazz-combos-concert-10">Jazz Combos Concert</a></span>
  </div>
</li>
      </ul>
</div><div class="item-list date">
    	    <h5><span class="month day-of-the-week">Oct</span>
        <span class="day">20</span>
    </h5>
    <ul>
          <li class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">  
  <div class="views-field-title">

		<div class="wrapper">
		
			<header id="header-region">
				<section id="audience-gateways">
					<div class="marginator">
						<h6>Information For:</h6> 
						<ul> 
							<li id="gateway-current-students" class="first"><a href="/gateway/current-students">Current Students</a></li> 
							<li id="gateway-faculty"><a href="/gateway/faculty">Faculty</a></li>

						<section id="banner" class="marginator banner">
						
	
	<div id="block-ultibanner-0" class="clear-block block block-ultibanner ">
	
		
		<div class="content">
<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

			
	    
		</div><!-- end .meta -->
	</div>

</article>

	</div>

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Advanced Musicianship I</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1010 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 16530]</span></h3>


  	Training in advanced musicianship skills relevant to Western art music from the sixteenth Century to the present, including sight singing, ear training, score reading, keyboard harmony, improvisation, and musical transcription. Prerequisite: MUSC 0560 with a grade of B, or permission of the instructor.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>0.5</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>65</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Arlene+M+Cole">Arlene M Cole</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">14:00 - 14:50 Mon, Wed, Fri - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>07</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Major Masters and Repertoires of Music: Bach</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 1500A S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 16532]</span></h3>


  	An examination of the life and work of Bach, including its placce in German church music, views of his contemporaries and explanation of hi manuscript and publishing history.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>16</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Louis+F+Jodry">Louis F Jodry</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">09:00 - 10:20 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>08</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->

  <div class="views-field-title">
                <span class="field-content"><a href="/academics/music/events/brown-wind-symphony-concert">Brown Wind Symphony Concert</a></span>

      </ul>

				<div id="brown-masthead">
				
					<div id="brown-brand">
						<div class="marginator">
							<h1><a href="http://www.brown.edu" accesskey="1" title="Brown University Homepage"><img src="/academics/music/sites/all/themes/ursa-minor/img/brown-logo.png" alt="" /><span>Brown University</span></a></h1>
							
								<div id="search-theme-form" class="clear-block block block-google_cse ">
										<form action="/academics/music/search/google" accept-charset="UTF-8" method="get" id="google-cse-searchbox-form">

<article id="node-" class="main-article node node-unpublished">






  <h2><a href="/academics/music/node/" title=""></a></h2>


  <div class="content">
          </div>

	
  <div class="clear-block">
    <div class="meta">

			
	    
		</div><!-- end .meta -->

<!-- Layout -->

				<div id="content">
					<div class="marginator">
					
					

									
					<div class="columns main-columns">

						<h1 class="article-title  with-tabs">Computers and Music</h1>
						
						

						<div id="body-content" class="second-column column main-column">

							
																												
							
							<div class="clear-block">
								
  <div class="content brown-course-detail">
		
  	<h3>MUSC 0200 S01 <span class="crn">[<abbr title="Course Reference Number">CRN</abbr>: 16533]</span></h3>


  	Examine the history, literature, production and theory of music technology. Track development of musical inventions and their impact on musical thought, production and culture. Develop theoretical and practical knowledge of computer music based on first-hand experience in the Multimedia Lab, using computer music software and hardware to complete creative assignments. Gain an appreciation for the pioneering work done in previous decades, both in research and composition. Become familiar with the literature of electronic music and learn about the impact of technology on popular and experimental genres. Permission granted based on questionnaire given in first class. Preference given to lower-level students.
		
		

		<dl>
		
		
		
		
		
		



					<dt>Term</dt>
			<dd>Fall 2017</dd>
		
					<dt>Credit Hours</dt>
			<dd>1</dd>
		
					<dt>Maximum Enrollment</dt>
			<dd>999</dd>
		
		


												
	<dt>Primary Instructor</dt>

		<dd>
		<div class="vcard">
			<div>
						<a class="url fn" href="http://directory.brown.edu/search?search_string=Todd+E+Winkler">Todd E Winkler</a>
			</div>
			
			
		</div>
	</dd>
				
			

	
					<dt>Meetings</dt>
									<dd>
						<span class="room"> </span>
						<span class="times">10:30 - 11:50 Tue, Thu - from Sep 6, 2017 to Dec 21, 2017</span>
						</dd>
							
		
		
		
					<dt>Exam Group Code</dt>
			<dd>13</dd>
		


		</dl>
  </div>

							</div>

							
													</div><!-- end .second-column -->
